lead_paragraph: The Irish tenor Ronan Tynan, a fixture at Yankee Stadium for years, was disinvited by the team after he admitted making an anti-Semitic remark at his Manhattan apartment building a day earlier.
snippet: The Irish tenor Ronan Tynan, a fixture at Yankee Stadium for years, was disinvited by the team after he admitted making an anti-Semitic remark at his Manhattan apartment building a day earlier.
